mapper.select: select id, title, author_name, centent, image_url, publish_time, source from qctt_news_grab where id = #{id}

select id, title, author_name, centent, image_url, publish_time, source from qctt_news_grab WHERE id in ( SELECT news_id FROM qctt_news_grab_extend WHERE crawled_style LIKE #{crawledStyle}) order by publish_time desc limit #{offset},#{limit}

select id, title, author_name, centent, image_url, publish_time, source from qctt_news_grab WHERE id in ( SELECT news_id FROM qctt_news_grab_extend WHERE crawled_style LIKE #{crawledStyle}) order by publish_time desc limit #{offset},#{limit}
select id, title, author_name, centent, image_url, publish_time, source from qctt_news_grab WHERE title LIKE #{keyWords} order by publish_time desc limit #{offset},#{limit}
